Translations.Text: Surely Allah will admit those who believe and do good deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and with pearls, and their dress therein will be (of) silk
Guided they were to the good word (of faith) and guided they were to the path of (Allah,) the Praised One

Surely (We will punish) those who disbelieve and prevent (people) from the way of Allah and from Al-Masjid-ul-HarƒÅm (the Sacred Mosque), which We have made for all men, where residents and visitors are all equal. And whoever intends therein to commit deviation with injustice, We will make him taste a painful punishment
